page.title: 08Community life in New Hedges
page.content: We interviewed an elderly resident who has witnessed the changes in community life within New Hedges village. The village has changed considerably over the last seventy years.Originally it was a close knit farming community , composed of twelve farmsteads,and twelve cottages for the farm workers and their families.Now the number of buildings and residents has increased considerably;but there only remains four of the original farms. The New Hedges By_pass has helped enormously to sustain village life no longer is the village divided by a constant stream of traffic. The once thriving farms have directed their interests to tourism,developing their land as suitable caravan and camping Parks.The village is retaining it's community spirit which is vital.
